attributes.action: Reduce the price of a student ticket on Chelmsford Park and Rides.
attributes.additional_details: The standard day ticket price was £3.50, and is now £3.60. This adds up to over £40 a month (on top of petrol) trying to get to university. When living on student loan and minuscule income this is a lot.
attributes.background: As students at Anglia Ruskin (Chelmsford), we are forced to use the park and ride system as there is no parking on the University campus. This adds time to our already long commutes and an unnecessary amount of money. We understand that we are paying for parking and use of the bus, but we HAVE to.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
